summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in blocks 29 and 30, Law's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 5th Avenue West and 6th Avenue West, from West Garfield Street to West Blaine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Petition No. 102945 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
